verses.text: \w A|strong="H3068"\w* \w song|strong="H7892"\w*. \w A|strong="H3068"\w* \w Psalm|strong="H4210"\w* \w of|strong="H4210"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*. \w My|strong="H1732"\w* heart \w is|strong="H1732"\w* steadfast, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* God; I \w will|strong="H7892"\w* \w sing|strong="H7892"\w* \w and|strong="H1732"\w* make \w music|strong="H7892"\w* \w with|strong="H1732"\w* all \w my|strong="H1732"\w* being.
Awake, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* harp \w and|strong="H3820"\w* lyre! \w I|strong="H3559"\w* \w will|strong="H3820"\w* awaken \w the|strong="H3559"\w* dawn.

\w I|strong="H5782"\w* will praise You, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, among \w the|strong="H5782"\w* nations; \w I|strong="H5782"\w* will sing \w Your|strong="H5782"\w* praises among \w the|strong="H5782"\w* peoples.

\w For|strong="H3068"\w* \w Your|strong="H3068"\w* loving devotion extends beyond \w the|strong="H3068"\w* heavens, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w Your|strong="H3068"\w* faithfulness reaches \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* clouds.

\w Be|strong="H8064"\w* exalted, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H8064"\w*, \w above|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w*; may \w Your|strong="H5921"\w* glory cover \w all|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w earth|strong="H8064"\w*.

Respond \w and|strong="H8064"\w* save \w us|strong="H5921"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w Your|strong="H3605"\w* right hand, \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w Your|strong="H3605"\w* beloved \w may|strong="H3519"\w* \w be|strong="H8064"\w* delivered.

God \w has|strong="H3225"\w* spoken \w from|strong="H2502"\w* \w His|strong="H6030"\w* sanctuary: “I \w will|strong="H4616"\w* triumph! I \w will|strong="H4616"\w* parcel \w out|strong="H2502"\w* Shechem \w and|strong="H6030"\w* apportion \w the|strong="H6030"\w* Valley \w of|strong="H3225"\w* Succoth.

Gilead \w is|strong="H1696"\w* \w Mine|strong="H1696"\w*, \w and|strong="H6944"\w* Manasseh \w is|strong="H1696"\w* \w Mine|strong="H1696"\w*; Ephraim \w is|strong="H1696"\w* \w My|strong="H1696"\w* helmet, Judah \w is|strong="H1696"\w* \w My|strong="H1696"\w* scepter.
Moab \w is|strong="H7218"\w* My washbasin; \w upon|strong="H3063"\w* Edom I toss My sandal; \w over|strong="H7218"\w* Philistia I shout \w in|strong="H3063"\w* triumph.”

Who \w will|strong="H4124"\w* bring \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* fortified city? Who \w will|strong="H4124"\w* lead \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* Edom?

\w Have|strong="H5892"\w* \w You|strong="H5704"\w* \w not|strong="H5892"\w* rejected us, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H4310"\w*? \w Will|strong="H4310"\w* \w You|strong="H5704"\w* \w no|strong="H4310"\w* longer march \w out|strong="H5704"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H4310"\w*, \w with|strong="H5892"\w* our armies?

Give \w us|strong="H2186"\w* aid against \w the|strong="H3318"\w* enemy, \w for|strong="H6635"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* help \w of|strong="H6635"\w* man \w is|strong="H6635"\w* \w worthless|strong="H3808"\w*.
With God \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H6862"\w* perform with valor, \w and|strong="H7723"\w* He \w will|strong="H6862"\w* trample our \w enemies|strong="H6862"\w*.
